infos.value: Perhaps we should consider not walking through those gates as an option.
Wh-what are you saying? You do not plan on returning to the castle?
Lilyth, what do you mean? Please explain.
I think...King Oelde may not have a plan this time.
You're right. I suspected the same thing.
Hold on a second here. If we are not going back to the castle, what exactly is our plan?
You're honestly suggesting that we just abandon the castle?
Whether we take refuge inside the castle or not, Leonis will fall sooner or later.
But if Lord Mont survives, then the Leonis bloodline can live on.
The decision is yours, Lord Mont. As is my sword.
